content.question: In lines 12-13 (“Misfit . . . system”), sentence fragments and a stanza break are used to

choices.label: provide an ironic counterpoint to those lines’ discussion of the speaker’s faults
emphasize the casual ease with which the beloved solves emotional problems
reinforce those lines’ description of the beloved’s relationship to space and time
mirror the glasses and vases broken by the beloved in the first stanza

content.answer: reinforce those lines’ description of the beloved’s relationship to space and time

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
